data.text: @JKSteinberger Here in Sweden nomasks even in transport. Nothing.

@JKSteinberger @holz_bau Now compare that rate to a place with zero preventative measures like Florida, on a per capita basis 👀

Hint: itâ€™s almost exactly the same

@JKSteinberger If you look at the wastewater data from Eawag, it even seems that (at least in the german speaking part) the previous decline in cases was more driven by the change in testing policies rather than by a marked improvement of the epidemiological situation.
@JKSteinberger It was a minority on the bus yesterday as well.

I still mask up in stores etc, and so do some others, but it's a minority. Such a simple thing to do to keep each other safe ... 
In good news, managed to get my son vaccinated (after he caught it in January). Yay science & healthcare!!! He's fine. His arm didn't even hurt.
